name: Mystic Destinies: Deluxe Edition
description:
After a ritual forces immense magical powers onto you, you're thrown into a new world with new threats and challenges that you'd never dreamed of. Play as twenty-year-old university student Tsubasa Fujimoto as she learns to balance her daily life with her new supernatural one - all while falling in love. 

Will you survive the perilous journey and become a legendary sorceress?

Experience the full Mystic Destinies experience with additional content! 

Contains over 30 hours of content!:

  • Shou's Main Story & Epilogue
  • Tatsuya's Main Story & Epilogue
  • Shinji's Main Story & Epilogue
  • Hikaru's Main Story & Epilogue
  • Go deeper into Mystic Destinies lore with the God of Chaos story.
  • See what he was thinking during a pivotal scene in His POV short stories.
  • Get the digital artbook with new facts about the characters!
  • Listen to the highly anticipated original soundtrack!
